overview:
Isaac Wolkerstorfer is the Chief Technical Officer at 6Wunderkinder, where he works closely with a talented team to build the next big leap forward for productivity. His passion for technical excellence, innovation and user experience make him a perfect fit for the 6Wunderkinder team.

Isaac’s experience at Yahoo!, Inc. as a Front-End Technical Lead prepared him for building responsive user experiences at scale, while his ventures into entrepreneurship as co-founder of OpenHive, Inc. helped whet his appetite for being actively involved in the start-up scene.

He is excited not only to be part of the 6Wunderkinder phenomenon, but also of the larger flourishing tech start-up community in Berlin.

Isaac received an A. B. with Honors in Computer Science from the University of Chicago, and is currently writing his thesis for a C. S. Master’s Degree from the Berlin Institute of Technology.
